name: Data Structures
description: Your classic data structures class, taught in both C and Python. In C, we implemented dynamic arrays, linked lists, sorting algorithms, hash maps, sets, stacks, and more, while in Python, we implemented doubly linked lists, trees, binary trees, self-rotating trees, heaps, graphs, and graph search algorithms. The class also covered common algorithms, such as BFS, DFS, Dijkstra's, Prim's, Kahn's, heapsort, merge sort, quicksort, and more.
